message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your value for the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $85. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your counteroffer, but $85 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $90?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I am willing to consider $90, but I would like to counter with $87. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
